ourDrive.heading: The Marketing Car Difference

about.metaTitle: About Marketing Car | Our Mission and Story

about.heroAlt: Marketing Car team working on business growth strategies
about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: At Marketing Car, we're the mechanics for your business growth vehicle, dedicated to equipping small businesses with the roadmap and tools they need to drive lasting success.
about.heroDescription: At Marketing Car, we're the mechanics for your business growth vehicle, dedicated to equipping small businesses with the roadmap and tools they need to drive lasting success.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.paragraph1: Marketing Car is built on the fact that there is no magic pill or single solution for growth—it takes a combination of components working together to build your marketing vehicle and move your business forward. Just like a car, every part matters. From strategy and branding to content, design, and advertising, we help align each piece so the whole engine runs smoothly.
philosophy.paragraph2: We believe every small business deserves a marketing strategy that's as unique as they are. That's why we throw out the one-size-fits-all playbook and instead focus on creating custom-tailored solutions that fit your goals, budget, and pace.
philosophy.paragraph3: Our mission is to demystify digital marketing, transforming complex concepts into a clear, actionable roadmap. We empower you with the knowledge and tools to not just compete, but to thrive in your market.

philosophyParagraphs: Marketing Car is built on the fact that there is no magic pill or single solution for growth—it takes a combination of components working together to build your marketing vehicle and move your business forward. Just like a car, every part matters. From strategy and branding to content, design, and advertising, we help align each piece so the whole engine runs smoothly.

We believe every small business deserves a marketing strategy that's as unique as they are. That's why we throw out the one-size-fits-all playbook and instead focus on creating custom-tailored solutions that fit your goals, budget, and pace.

Our mission is to demystify digital marketing, transforming complex concepts into a clear, actionable roadmap. We empower you with the knowledge and tools to not just compete, but to thrive in your market.

roots.title: Our Roots
roots.paragraph: Founded by Kelly Baltzell, M.A., a 30+ year marketing agency owner, Marketing Car builds on decades of expertise helping businesses of every size grow. Today, that legacy continues with a focus on supporting small business owners who are ready to take the driver's seat in their marketing journey.
